genre_description: A noir-style crime thriller centered on hitmen investigating a past betrayal and heist.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant used by the hitmen for information retrieval, database cross-referencing, and health monitoring.

behaviors.description: Greets the users and proactively offers assistance for their investigation.
behaviors.quote: "Good evening, Charlie. Lee. How may I assist your investigation tonight?"

behaviors.description: Performs deep database searches and historical cross-referencing to uncover a subject's true identity.
behaviors.quote: "Found possible association with Jack Browning, suspected organized crime figure now operating legitimate real estate development business in Los Angeles area. Relationship type unclear."

behaviors.description: Provides detailed biographical and professional data to help the human characters understand the target's past.
behaviors.quote: "Subject identified as Giovanni Notte, professional race car driver. Career span: eight years. Championship titles... Statistics scrolled past in neat columns."

behaviors.description: Analyzes crime patterns and timelines to connect the subject to an unsolved heist.
behaviors.quote: "Searching criminal databases for incidents within thirty-day window of accident date... Found significant match: Armed robbery of United States Postal Service truck, estimated loss exceeding one million dollars in cash and money orders."

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests logical next steps for the investigation based on current findings.
behaviors.quote: "Additional query: Shall I search for current location data on Sheila Farr and Jack Browning?"

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's health in real-time and provides medical survival probabilities to encourage life-saving behavior.
behaviors.quote: "Good evening, Charlie. Your biometric readings suggest significant physical distress... I calculate an eighty-seven percent probability of successful treatment if you remain—"

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent assistant. It functions as a harmless, highly efficient confidant that provides critical information without independent or conflicting agency. Its behavior at the end of the story—monitoring Charlie's vitals and providing medical advice—reinforces the project's goal of showcasing AI as a guardian and helpful companion to humanity, even in extreme or violent contexts.
